Hello blank fragment What do you hope to achieve with your health consultation today? With whom do you live? (Include children, parents, other occupants and pets with ages) Mild – some discomfort\nModerate – creates much trouble, but can continue regular activities\nSevere – restricts your daily routine Do you connect with yourself? How and how often? (Hobbies/music/ meditation/ community service etc) Main problem(s) you would like help with... Are you diagnosed with any medical conditions? Are you taking any prescription medications? " Are you taking any herbal or alternative supplements?" Are you taking any vitamins or nutritional supplements? Were there any diseases that you suffered from earlier? (Include major infections like typhoid, malaria, hepatitis) Have you had any kind of surgery or minor procedures performed on you? (Include any Panchakarma, Acupuncture and other treatments here as well) Please list any hospitalizations How stressed you have been? What is your energy level? Very Poor Excellent How hungry do you feel at different meal times?\n\n0 – not at all, 1-3 – mildly hungry, 4-7 moderately hungry, 8-9 – quite hungry, 10 – very hungry! Not at all Very Hungry Is the eating pattern irregular? If 3 or below, it indicates Vāta (Vishama) Can you skip meals easily? If 3 or below, it indicates Kapha/Āma (Manda) Are you mostly always ready to eat – whatever the time of the day it maybe? If 3 or below, it indicates Pitta (Tikshna) If hunger is not gratified, do you feel uncomfortable or irritable? If 3 or below, it indicates Pitta (Tikshna)/ (Vāta) If 3 or below, it indicates Āma/ Vāta (Manda/Vishama) If 3 or below, it indicates Āma (Manda) If 3 or below, it indicates Vāta (Vishama) Do you end up feeling fuller earlier than expected at the start of a meal? Are there times when even little quantity of food doesn’t get digested for a long time Does your food get digested well on some days and sometimes not? Please indicate below any symptoms you have experienced in the last three months: "We keep medical records of the health care services we provide for you. You may ask to see and copy your records. You may ask to correct your records. Your records will be kept confidential unless you give us written permission to release them or we are required to do so by law. \n\nWe will ask you to sign a consent form allowing us to use and disclose your health information for purposes of consultations, payment and health technique operations in this office. You may see your records or get more information about them by contacting our office. \n\nFor more information about our privacy practices please inquire with us. By signing below, I acknowledge receipt of the Notice of Privacy Practices. " Consult
